mapper.select: select zz.draft_no from (select rownum n, z.draft_no, z.emp_no from (select draft_no, l.emp_no, e.emp_name, p.position_name, p.step, app_check, app_date from draft_line l join emp e on l.emp_no = e.emp_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where app_check != '1' and draft_no = #{param1} order by step desc) z join draft d on z.draft_no = d.draft_no where cg_no = #{param3}) zz where zz.n = 1 and zz.emp_no = #{param2}
